channel.title: Comments on: OpenStack cloud in a single box

item.title: By: bmullan
item.dc:creator: bmullan
item.description:
Make sure you look at Adam Stoke's now "conjure-up openstack" installation for LXD & Openstack.
http://conjure-up.io/
He was one of the authors of the previous "single-installer" but the new Conjure-Up works much faster/better with juju/LXD & openstack

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: And whenever do unstack.sh to clean up, don't forget to unset all those OS_* environment variables what for nova, etc. unstack.sh uses some of them which cause all sort of confusion.
